rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.desc: Effective against armored and cavalry units. Eirika only.

shamshir.name: Shamshir
shamshir.desc: Eirika/Assassin/Myrmidon/Swordmaster only. Improves critical hit rate.

armorslayer.name: Armorslayer
armorslayer.desc: Effective against knights, generals and great knights.

lightbrand.name: Light Brand
lightbrand.desc: Hits on resistance. At 2 range, deals <:gba_light:686566425988431889>Light damage, halves strength, cannot crit and doesn't give weapon experience.

hatchet.name: Hatchet
hatchet.desc: Lightweight and easy to hit with.

excalibur.name: Excalibur
excalibur.desc: A Sacred Twin tome. Spd +5. Effective against monsters.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: Restores HP to distant allies. HP restored = (Magic + 10)

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores HP to all allies in one area. HP restored = (Magic + 10)

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: Drives enemies to attack wildly in a frenzy of rage.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Warps allies to a space adjacent to the staff wielder.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: Increases vision in fog by 4 squares. Effect decreases by 1 each turn.

angelicrobe.name: Angelic Robe
angelicrobe.desc: Increases HP by a max of 7 points. Vanishes after use.

energyring.name: Energy Ring
energyring.desc: Increases Mag or Str by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

secretbook.name: Secret Book
secretbook.desc: Increases Skill by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

speedwing.name: Speedwing
speedwing.desc: Increases speed by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

goddessicon.name: Goddess Icon
goddessicon.desc: Increases luck by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

dragonshield.name: Dragonshield
dragonshield.desc: Increases defense by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: Increases resistance by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

swiftsole.name: Swiftsole
swiftsole.desc: Increases movement by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

bodyring.name: Body Ring
bodyring.desc: Increases constitution by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

herocrest.name: Hero Crest
herocrest.desc: For mercenaries, myrmidons, and fighters Lv. 10 and up.

knightcrest.name: Knight Crest
knightcrest.desc: For knights and cavaliers Lv. 10 and up.

elysianwhip.name: Elysian Whip
elysianwhip.desc: For pegasus knights and wyvern riders Lv. 10 and up.

guidingring.name: Guiding Ring
guidingring.desc: For magic wielders and troubadours Lv. 10 and up.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.desc: Opens doors and chests. Usable only by thieves.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.desc: A powerful solution that restores all HP.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Raises Resistance by 7. Effect decreases by 1 each turn.

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.desc: A medicinal solution that cures poison.

filishield.name: Fili Shield
filishield.desc: An amulet that protects fliers from arrows.

membercard.name: Member Card
membercard.desc: If someone with this card stops in a suspicious space...

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: A special card that reduces the cost of all items by half.

reginleif.name: Reginleif
reginleif.desc: Effective against cavalry and knights. Ephraim only.

hoplonguard.name: Hoplon Guard
hoplonguard.desc: A device that negates enemy critical attacks.

sieglinde.name: Sieglinde
sieglinde.desc: The Sacred Twin storm blade. Str +5. Effective against monsters. Eirika only.

ivaldi.name: Ivaldi
ivaldi.desc: A Sacred Twin tome. Def +5. Effective against monsters.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: For some units Lv. 10 and up who have not changed class.

metisstome.name: Metis's Tome
metisstome.desc: Increases the growths of an unit by 5%.

latona.name: Latona
latona.desc: Restores all HP as well as allies' status.

vidofnir.name: Vidofnir
vidofnir.desc: The Sacred Twin winged lance. Def +5. Effective against monsters.

wretchedair.name: Wretched Air
wretchedair.desc: Grants +10 strength, +10 skill, +20 defense and +10 resistance when equipped. Ignores def/res.

audhulma.name: Audhulma
audhulma.desc: The Sacred Twin ice blade. Res +5. Effective against monsters.

siegmund.name: Siegmund
siegmund.desc: The Sacred Twin fire lance. Str +5. Effective against monsters. Ephraim only.

garm.name: Garm
garm.desc: The Sacred Twin black axe. Spd +5. Effective against monsters.

nidhogg.name: Nidhogg
nidhogg.desc: The Sacred Twin serpent bow. Luck +5. Effective against monsters.

oceanseal.name: Ocean Seal
oceanseal.desc: For use by thieves and pirates Lv. 10 and up.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.desc: Inflicts sleep status on all foes within range.

demonlight.name: Demon Light
demonlight.desc: Grants +10 strength, +10 skill, +10 luck, +10 defense, +15 resistance when equipped.

ravager.name: Ravager
ravager.desc: Grants +15 strength, +15 skill, +15 defense, +10 resistance when equipped.

dragonstone.name: Dragonstone
dragonstone.desc: A stone imbued with mysterious might. Grants +12 strength, +12 skill, +15 defense, +20 resistance when equipped. Effective against monsters.

fetidclaw.name: Fetid Claw
fetidclaw.desc: A foul talon meant to rend flesh.

lethaltalon.name: Lethal Talon
lethaltalon.desc: A claw slathered in deadly poison.

stone.name: Stone
stone.desc: Turns targets to stone for a while.

junafruit.name: Juna Fruit
junafruit.desc: Reduces user's level by 1-5. Can be used by units at level 10 or higher.

torchstaff.name: Torch
torchstaff.desc: Increases vision in fog by 9 squares. Effect decreases by 1 each turn.
